Headline: #49 Western,#X49 Western Express Temporary Reroute near Western/35th
ShortDescription: 49 Western, X49 Western Express buses temp. rerouted NB: Wester., Archer and Western Blvd. SB 31st, California, Archer and Western: near Western/35th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western,#X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Western/35th, due to street blockage near Western/35th.

Northbound buses will operate via Western, Archer,and Western Boulevard including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Southbound buses will operate via Western, 31st, California and Archer.

Allow extra travel time.
